MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA19 postcode area of Gourock, affecting properties in Iona Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07:54am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:56am on the 8th of January 2021
